about_the_game:
Introduction

This is a desktop pet that supports customization, supports painting, spine, and sprite animation. There are also event interactions, and other interesting functions. You can use the assets to make your own desktop pet, and customize its behavior, voice, sound effects, shader, etc. Of course, you can also directly download desktop pets shared by others through the Steam Workshop. This desktop pet is derived from another free desktop pet project: Azur Lane Secretary. You can find it on github.
This desktop pet has a default character with dynamic animations, and a rough image of her is as follows. However, the final version of her is actually different.
*Character is AI-generated.

How to customize

When downloading this project, an e-book will be attached, which explains in detail the various attributes of the custom character, instructions, and the organization of assets files, etc., and there are examples to teach you how to make a desktop pet. If you wish to customize your own desktop pet, please take a moment to read it carefully. Customizing desktop pets do not require you to have any programming foundation, and if there is any knowledge that needs to be supplemented, it will be directly given in the article. The behavior of custom desktop pets is relatively complicated, and you can customize it in a programming-like way, so there will be a very simple "programming language" for you to learn (even if you have no programming foundation, you can quickly master it). Many useful functions are provided in it. Although this part is a little complicated, you can do many things with this simple "programming language", such as controlling her different behaviors at different favorability levels by defining a variable "favorite level"; The reaction of different keys, including playing the animation and audio, such as controlling the character to walk on the desktop by pressing WASD and playing the walking animation; there are other useful functions, such as detecting the system time, if it is already late at night and you have not slept, then she will gently remind you to go to sleep, or simply kick you out of the computer (shut down your computer)...Using the functions provided, you can create a pet that suits you according to your personal preferences or needs!

Further Information

This project will be updated for a long time, and more functions will be added in the future (Live2D and 3D model will be available in the future). If you are not satisfied with this project now, you can put forward your comments or suggestions at the bottom of the comment area, or contact the author in the following ways:
QQ group 515079733
bilibili @月夜Crescent
We will try to make this project one of the best desktop pets.

Tnanks

Special thanks to XChy's project XEL and XSharp, his project helps a lot to this desktop project on behavior customization. Please visit his page at Github @XChy.
